a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Level of income: top 10% vs bottom 10%, World, 1990 to 2019
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
P90 - level of income of top 10%
P10 - level of income of bottom 10%
Source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices. It relates to either disposable income or expenditure per capita (exact definitions
